item.title: Ninja add a quote by Ask a Ninja!
item.description:
"I am Ninja He is Ninja She is Ninja too
We are Ninja They are Ninja But I believe that you are Ninja too!!!!" -- Ask a Ninja!

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Eric Anderson
item.description: "Wikkity, every time you punch a ninjaâ€¦an angel gets its wings " -- Eric Anderson

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Cheryl Aylward Whitesel
item.description: "Koji's mouth twitched in disgust. "Who are you people?" he asked, as he had before. "You're not..." But he didn't even dare say that dangerous word-- ninja." -- Cheryl Aylward Whitesel

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Stephen K. Hayes
item.description: "Finding a master of the dark art of ninjutsu in modern westernized Japan seems as unlikely as finding an active practitioner of the magic of Merlin in contemporary industrialized England." -- Stephen K. Hayes

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Etgar Keret
item.description: "Rabbits are played. Nowadays it's all about the turtles. Tell them it's a ninja, they'll freak." -- Etgar Keret

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Sophocles
item.description: "Death is not the worst thing; rather, when one who craves death cannot attain even that wish." -- Sophocles

item.title: Ninja add a quote by Michael Chabon
item.description: "I HAD known him as a bulldozer, as a samurai, as an android programmed to kill, as Plastic Man and Titanium Man and Matter-Eater Lad, as a Buick Electra, as a Peterbilt truck, and even, for a week, as the Mackinac Bridge, but it was as a werewolf that Timothy Stokes finally went too far." -- Michael Chabon
